initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:root_fossil"}]}] add RootHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:claw_fossil"}]}] add ClawHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:helix_fossil"}]}] add HelixHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:dome_fossil"}]}] add DomeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:old_amber_fossil"}]}] add AmberHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:armor_fossil"}]}] add ArmorHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:skull_fossil"}]}] add SkullHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:cover_fossil"}]}] add CoverHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:plume_fossil"}]}] add PlumeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:jaw_fossil"}]}] add JawHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:sail_fossil"}]}] add SailHave');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: You have a Fossil, don't you? Shall I restore it for you?

action: q.dialogue.set_page('fossilpick1');
q.dialogue.set_page('bye1');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which Fossil should I restore for you?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:root_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive lileep level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:claw_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive anorith  level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:helix_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive omanyte level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:dome_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive kabuto level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.dialogue.set_page('fossilpick2');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which Fossil should I restore for you?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:old_amber_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive aerodactyl level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:armor_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive shieldon level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:skull_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive cranidos level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:cover_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive tirtouga level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.dialogue.set_page('fossilpick3');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which Fossil should I restore for you?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:plume_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive archen level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:jaw_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive tyrunt level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:sail_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive amaura level=20');
q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.dialogue.set_page('fossilpick1');
q.dialogue.set_page('bye1');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: OK, then! I'll turn that Fossil back into a Pokémon for you!

action: q.dialogue.set_page('page3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:eggget ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.dialogue.set_page('page4');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: I restored the Fossil you gave me, turning it back into a Pokémon!

action: q.dialogue.set_page('page5');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Please take good care of it.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove RootHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ClawHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove HelixHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove DomeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove AmberHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ArmorHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove SkullHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove CoverHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove PlumeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove JawHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove SailHave');
q.dialogue.close();

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Oh, you'd like to keep it as a Fossil? I understand.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove RootHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ClawHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove HelixHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove DomeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove AmberHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ArmorHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove SkullHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove CoverHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove PlumeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove JawHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove SailHave');
q.dialogue.close();
